programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Gizka Oňová sa ako profesionálna Svokra vracia na obrazovky s novými príbehmi. O pomoc ju tentokrát prosí Marek (36), ktorému sa rozpadá manželstvo. Jeho žena Silvia mu jedného dňa oznámila, že ho už nemiluje, rozvod však odmieta. Majú spolu štyri deti, ktoré sú dennodenne vystavené hádkam a celú situáciu znášajú najťažšie. Najstarší syn sa dokonca pokúsil o samovraždu. Marek dúfa, že Svokre sa podarí vyriešiť túto ťažkú situáciu a pomôže jeho rodine nájsť pokoj a lásku.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Umelec: Tridsaťročný Juraj je talentovaným hudobníkom, no ako manžel a otec šesťročnej Ninky je neschopný a nezodpovedný. Manželka Martina už nedokáže riešiť problémy každodenného života a tak prichádza medzi nimi k častým hádkam. Juraj však chce dokázať, že uživí rodinu a chopí sa zaujímavej príležitosti. Verí, že tá zmení život celej rodiny...

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Svadba: Janka a Andrej prežívali najkrajšie obdobie života – o dva týždne sa mali brať. Snažili sa naplánovať každý detail svadby. Niekoľko dní pred obradom však niekto z rodiny náhle zistí, že sobáš treba za každú cenu zrušiť...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Malé klamstvá: Maroš sa ženil mladý a jeho manželstvo s Marianou skončilo rozvodom, z ktorého sa dlho spamätával. Nedávno však stretol o dvadsať rokov mladšiu Veroniku, s ktorou začali spolu žiť a sú šťastní. Jeho bývalá žena sa s touto skutočnosťou nevie zmieriť...

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Zas je niekto tehotný?: Zuzana na sebe pozoruje symptómy tehotenstva. František je sprvu zdesený, ale nakoniec sa z toho teší. K Ildikó sa dostala informácia, že ju László podvádza s kolegyňou Farkašovou z Lesnej správy. László chce byť krstným otcom Milkinho dieťaťa a kúpi retiazku so srdiečkom a písmenkom E. Kedže Farkašová aj dieťa majú rovnakú iniciálu krstného mena, László bude mať čo vysvetľovať. Presvedčí Ildikó, že je jej verný? Ako zareaguje Farkašová? Potvrdí gynekológ Zuzanino tehotenstvo?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Kde je dieťa?: Začali predvianočné výpredaje. Marta s Andrejkou chcú ísť nakupovať a zavolajú aj susedky. Ale Zuzana nestíha bez auta rozvážať tovar a navyše musia s Františkom strážiť vnuka. Zuza je z toho na nervy a dokonca sa jej vnuk aj stratí. Ildi dostane neodolateľnú ponuku od bratranca, ktorý má autobazár, na skoro nový bavorák za 3000 eur. Ak nájde kupca na ďalší, tak dostane 1000 € zľavu. No a Zuze by sa auto veľmi zišlo. Chlapi sa musia postarať o dieťa, ženy idú kúpiť autá. Kto pomôže so starosťou o Milkino bábätko, keď sú chlapi odvolaní do lesa? A ako dopadnú Zuzana a Ildikó so "skoro novými" autami z bazáru?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Rozchod: Andrejka už nemôže vydržať to, ako ju Ildikó šikanuje kvôli Gergelyiovi. Marta býva dočasne u Zuzany s Františkom, kým u nej menia okná, ktoré meškajú. A predsedu manželka vyhodila z bytu, tak tiež nemá kam ísť. Marta navyše pritúli aj dve mačky z ulice. Chlapi sa rozhodnú z tohto "blázinca" zmiznúť. Útočiskom bude lesná správa. Ako dopadnú vzťahy v bytovke? A čo zažijú chlapi na Lesnej správe?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Mikuláš: S mikulášskymi akciami sa roztrhlo vrece. František má byť čert na Lesnej správe a aj na Miestnom úrade. Akcie sa však prekrývajú a niekde ho musí zaskočiť László. Zuzana potrebuje od Lászla kostým Mikuláša, ale Ildikó tiež organizuje mikulášsku besiedku, s nutnou Lászlovou účasťou. Stihnú László a František v zdraví absolvovať rozdávanie darčekov toľkým deťom? Situáciu, hlavne pre Ildikó, komplikuje aj Gergely a Andrejka a treba sa postarať aj o malého Evana.

programme.title: Vaši Susedia
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR. To najlepšie zo Susedov.
programme.desc: Seriál SR. To najlepšie zo Susedov.

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Lenka je mamina deviatich nádherných detí. Za sebou má manželstvo s tyranom, ktoré sa podpísalo aj na jej zdraví. Po silnom údere do hlavy nepočuje na jedno ucho, má tam silný zápal, kvôli ktorému sa cíti slabá a často jej býva zle. Prišla dokonca aj o horné zuby. Vybil jej ich päsťou. S týmito problémami nikdy nebola u lekára, lebo nechcela mužovi, od ktorého napokon po 23 rokoch odišla, spôsobiť ťažkosti! A tomu všetkému sa museli prizerať deti. Svokru na pomoc zavolalo práve jedno z nich - „malá Lenka“. Najväčším problémom rodiny je totiž bývanie. Už rok a pol striedajú krízové centrá a veľmi túžia po domčeku na prenájom. Podarí sa Gizke vybaviť pre rodinu lepšie podmienky na život a zmieriť Lenku s jej rodičmi a súrodencami? Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach. Pomóc, ide svokra!! Príde, obráti naruby domácnosť, vychová Vaše deti, vychová Vášho psa... Jazdí po Slovensku a má čo povedať do všetkých aspektov domácnosti! Navštevuje problémové rodiny, ktoré z rôznych dôvodov volajú o pomoc skúsenej ženy (neporiadok, finančné starosti, lenivý manžel, neporiadne deti...). Počas niekoľkých dní bude najprv sledovať a neskôr dohovárať a vysvetľovať obom manželom ako na vec. Svokra je dôkazom toho, že aj reality show môžu mať pozitívne, dlhodobé, život meniace následky. Reality šou poskytuje pohľad na transformáciu domácnosti, dáva divákovi možnosť nahliadnuť, ako žijú slovenské rodiny a ako zvládajú svoje deti, domácnosť, rozpočet, atď. Každá epizóda je plná bystrých a užitočných tipov ako viesť domácnosť, ktoré si divák môže vyskúšať.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Neverná: Radim a Ema sú manželmi dvadsať rokov, majú dcéru Karolínu. Momentálne prekonávajú manželskú krízu, Radim bol manželke neverný. Ema i Karolína sa zhodou náhod zoznámia s tým istý mužom – výtvarníkom. Karolína sa do neho zamiluje, no jemu ide iba o jedno...

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú III
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Vlado pomôže Oľge zistiť, aký jed Kamenár pripravil. Michal bude musieť v Romanovej neprítomnosti opäť prevziať vedenie firmy. Biba si potom, čo ju Boris takmer udrel uvedomí, s akým človekom to vlastne žije.

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Zachráň ma: Boba a Peter sú tridsiatnici. Obaja sa už vyrovnali s faktom, že nemôžu mať deti a teraz sa pokúšajú o adopciu. Čaká ich doriešenie posledných úkonov a o niekoľko dní by si mali zobrať do starostlivosti dieťaťko z domova, na ktoré sa veľmi tešia. Do ich života však zasiahne nečakaná náhoda...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Umelec: Tridsaťročný Juraj je talentovaným hudobníkom, no ako manžel a otec šesťročnej Ninky je neschopný a nezodpovedný. Manželka Martina už nedokáže riešiť problémy každodenného života a tak prichádza medzi nimi k častým hádkam. Juraj však chce dokázať, že uživí rodinu a chopí sa zaujímavej príležitosti. Verí, že tá zmení život celej rodiny...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Kamarátky: Dvadsaťpäťročná Erika práve skončila školu, našla si zaujímavú prácu a rozhodla sa, že pôjde bývať s dvoma najlepšími kamarátkami. Darí sa jej aj v osobnom živote – zdá sa, že jej priateľ Maroš je naozaj dokonalý. Problémom je, že Erika ešte nie je pripravená na vážny vzťah...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Nová rodina: Štyridsiatnička Magda je už desať rokov rozvedená. Jej dcéry Ema a Eliška si zvykli, že mama je iba pre ne. Magda si však našla priateľa a rozhodla sa, že sa s ním nebude skrývať a dcéram ho predstaví. Ani jedna z dcér však z maminho vzťahu nie je nadšená...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Zvláštne priateľstvo: Manželia Martina a Peter vychovávajú šesťročnú dcérku Luciu. Momentálne však neprežívajú práve najlepšie obdobie. Peter často chodí na služobné cesty, a tak s rodinou netrávi toľko času, koľko by chcel. Martina si preto nájde kamarátku s rovnako starou dcérou. Niečo je však na Martine veľmi zvláštne...

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú III
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Cilka nečakane navštívi Vinca a na vlastné oči uvidí, že sa Gabika skutočne snaží opäť Vinca získať. Ján začne mať podozrenie, že Vlado má niečo spoločné s Romanovým otrávením. Paula odmietne Borisovi prezradiť, kde Biba je a jeho reakcia bude viac než prehnaná.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Halloweenska rozprávka: Blíži sa Halloween a František chystá v reštaurácii párty v štýle zombie. Druhú párty organizuje Sladká na tému "povolania". Lászlo chce, aby bola u nich doma, lebo Ildikó bude pokojnejšia. Nespokojný František sa opije. Ildikó chce skončiť so Zuzaninými videami, ale musí dodržať zmluvu. Nakrútia reklamu vo forme rozprávky. Zuzana je vlk a Ildikó Červená čiapočka. Lászlo vo Františkových veciach hrá horára. Andrejka je nešťastná, vrátila sa z Ameriky s megaprsiami. Ildikó má kontrakcie, ale v nemocnici majú kvôli bitke futbalových fanúšikov pohotovosť. Prístup na pôrodnú sálu si musí Lászlo vynútiť s puškou v ruke... Zarobia Lászlo a František na zombíckej párty? Bol poplach okolo pôrodu opodstatnený? Aké filmy mala Andrejka nakrúcať v Amerike?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Miss lesa: Konečne sobota! František aj László si chcú užiť voľný deň. Zuzana však pracuje na plné obrátky a v byte je nevídaný pohyb tovaru a zákazníkov. Ildikó zase priviedla domov celý žiacky orchester nacvičovať na akadémiu. Navyše predseda lesnej správy zabudol na výzvu z ministerstva a do pondelka treba zabezpečiť nábor brigádnikov. Podarí sa zorganizovať „Miss lesa“? Nahovoriť na účasť Andrejku? A čo ak sa na miss zúčastní aj predsedova dcéra?

programme.title: Love Island III
programme.sub-title: Hľadanie lásky v raji v novej sérii obľúbenej romantickej šou
programme.desc: Slniečko, odhalené telá, morský vzduch a dovolenková atmosféra. Na obrazovky TV Markíza sa vracia Love Island, horúca reality šou plná zábavy, slnka, romantiky a hľadania lásky v známej vile na španielskom ostrove Gran Canaria. Šesť párov vzniknutých počas prvej a druhej série obľúbenej reality šou je spolu dodnes a vytvoriť zamilovaný pár sa pokúsia aj súčasní „singles“ zo Slovenska a Česka, obyvatelia vily tretej série. Budú si nielen užívať krásne počasie a zábavné hry, ale pod dohľadom televíznych kamier budú hľadať lásku svojho života. Diváčky a diváci v „priamom prenose“ uvidia, ako sa mladí ľudia nechávajú opantať láskou, so všetkými vzostupmi a pádmi, so všetkými emóciami, ktoré tento najkrajší cit so sebou prináša. Vzniknuté páry prejdú testom pevnosti svojich vzťahov, pretože každému, kto nebude v páre alebo bude spárovaný účelovo, bude hroziť, že bude musieť šou opustiť. Víťazná dvojica získa rozprávkových 75 000 eur. Zamilované „srdiečka“ prevedie pobytom na ostrove lásky opäť hviezdna moderátorka Zorka Hejdová.

programme.title: Partička
programme.sub-title: Záruka najlepšej zábavy
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... V podstate úplne čokoľvek! A presne o to v medzičasom už kultovej zábavnej šou Partička ide - nenechať sa zaskočiť hocako absurdne znejúcim zadaním diabolského moderátora Dana Dangla a na veľkú radosť divákov v štúdiu i pred obrazovkami improvizovať ako o život! To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.title: Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Halloween 2018: Zuzana sa chystá na tematickú párty a musí tam s ňou ísť aj František. Ten však má dohodnutú návštevu cintorína s rodičmi. László a Ildikó sú tiež vychystaní "na dušičky", ale oblečením pripomínajú seriálové postavy. Keďže Marek nabúral Zuzanine auto musí ich odviezť Ildikó. Na párty tak pôjdu všetci, s krátkou zastávkou na cintoríne. Milka sa necíti dobre. Marek je presvedčený, že začína rodiť. Andrejka volá kamaráta záchranára, hoci Sladká to vraj zvládne aj doma. Domov sa ponáhľajú aj Fero, Zuzana, László a Ildikó, lenže auto neštartuje. Stihnú prísť včas? Ako zareaguje Ildikó na Andrejkinho priateľa záchranára? Dozvie sa mamička, že František miesto ich stretnutia na hroboch išiel v maske na párty?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Pôrod: Ildikó aj Zuzana vyhrali vianočné wellness pobyty. Chlapom sa to nepáči, chcú tradičné Vianoce, kým sa však hádajú kde, kto a s kým bude tráviť Vianoce, Milka začína rodiť a treba ju rýchlo zaviezť do nemocnice. Pojazdné auto má iba Ildikó, ktorá je na svoje auto veľmi citlivá. László si na upokojenie nalial "barackpálenku" a František 3 pivá. Marek síce nepil, ale zo stresu omdlieva. Nájde sa rýchly šofér a stihnú zaviezť Milku do pôrodnice?

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Najhoršie je, keď matka prežije svoje dieťa. Ešte horšie snáď je, keď vlastné dieťa matku oberie o byt a úspory. Eva, matka 5 dospelých detí, skončila ako bezdomovec v záhradnej chatke. Za niektorých platí z malej penzie stále pôžičky. Svokra robí čo môže, vybavuje na úradoch, stretáva sa s dcérou. Podarí sa otvoriť srdcia matke a dcére, aby opäť našli cestu k sebe? Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach. Pomóc, ide svokra!! Príde, obráti naruby domácnosť, vychová Vaše deti, vychová Vášho psa... Jazdí po Slovensku a má čo povedať do všetkých aspektov domácnosti! programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Hajzel: Renáta a Dalibor sa vyše roka snažia o dieťa, no nedarí sa im. Kým Dalibor sa zaujíma o kariéru, Renátu to veľmi trápi. Čoraz viac pociťuje, že v ich vzťahu chýba iskra a vzájomné vzrušenie. Istá správa jej vnukne myšlienku, že svoj život musí zásadne zmeniť...

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú III
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Roman omylom vypije jed, ktorý bol určený pre Vláda. Oľga sa bojí o Romana, je otrasená tým, že sa môže stať vrahyňou vlastného syna. Paula sa pokúsi tráviť viac času s Paľkom a uprednostní ho pred dôležitou zákazníčkou. Biba nájde medzi Borisovými vecami niečo, čo ju šokuje.

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Farma
programme.desc: Televízia Markíza prináša na obrazovky neuveriteľnú pätnástu sériu obľúbenej reality šou Farma. Tentokrát to na statku bude o „súboji generácií“, kedy o atraktívnu finančnú výhru zabojuje 15 farmárov, rozdelených do troch skupín podľa generácie. Každá sa narodila v inom období a práve Farma ukáže, ktorá generácia na statku uspeje – bude to skupina X, narodená pred rokom 1989, skupina Y – deti 90-tych rokov alebo najmladšia generácia Z, narodená po roku 2000? Fanúšikovia obľúbenej šou sa znovu môžu tešiť na staronové prostredie Považského Inovca, v ktorom sa natáčala 13. séria Farmy, nekompromisnú Alicu, nový typ farmárčenia spojený s množstvo noviniek a výrazne zmenené pravidlá, ktoré prekvapia nejedného farmára. Opäť nebudú chýbať ani napínavé duely či jednotlivé epizódy, v ktorých sa bude striedať smiech, slzy, vtipné i dramatické situácie, a tak ako vždy budú plné nečakaných zvratov. Šou bude divákov aj tento rok sprevádzať obľúbený herec Marek Fašiang a chýbať nebude ani ostrieľaný hospodár Martin Bagar.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Neverná: Radim a Ema sú manželmi dvadsať rokov, majú dcéru Karolínu. Momentálne prekonávajú manželskú krízu, Radim bol manželke neverný. Ema i Karolína sa zhodou náhod zoznámia s tým istý mužom – výtvarníkom. Karolína sa do neho zamiluje, no jemu ide iba o jedno...

programme.title: Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú III
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Vlado pomôže Oľge zistiť, aký jed Kamenár pripravil. Michal bude musieť v Romanovej neprítomnosti opäť prevziať vedenie firmy. Biba si potom, čo ju Boris takmer udrel uvedomí, s akým človekom to vlastne žije.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Marta. Komediálny seriál SR (2006).
programme.desc: Susedia si zaumienili, že nájdu konečne Marte vážnu známosť. Nápadníka Jara si zahrá herec Marián Slovák. Susedia ho predstavia Marte s veľkým očakávaním, že konečne on bude ten pravý muž. Veď presne spĺňa jej požiadavky, starší, sympatický, seriózny, skrátka normálny chlap. Ako však nakoniec vysvitne pre našu Martu je naozaj ťažké nájsť niekoho, koho ešte nepozná. V skutočnosti s milým Jarom už mala dočinenia, takže nič nové pre Martu. Bude to ďalší trapas?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Mikuláš. Komediálny seriál SR (2006).
programme.desc: V najbližšej časti Susedov opäť zahviezdi syn Petra Marcina. Po účinkovaní v Hurikáne (milionár s ružou), či v jednej z epizód Susedia (poslíček s pizzou), uvidíme najnovšie Petra Marcina ml. v úlohe Mikuláša. Ako sused Skotnický chodí po paneláku prezlečený za Mikuláša a navštevuje susedov. Nuž a aký by to boli Susedia bez zápletky a prekvapení. Ildikó si Petra Marcina ml. alias Mikuláša pomýli s Lászloóm, ktorý sa v podobnom prestrojení vybral na mikulášsku detskú akciu do Františkovej horárne.

programme.title: Farma
programme.desc: Televízia Markíza prináša na obrazovky neuveriteľnú pätnástu sériu obľúbenej reality šou Farma. Tentokrát to na statku bude o „súboji generácií“, kedy o atraktívnu finančnú výhru zabojuje 15 farmárov, rozdelených do troch skupín podľa generácie. Každá sa narodila v inom období a práve Farma ukáže, ktorá generácia na statku uspeje – bude to skupina X, narodená pred rokom 1989, skupina Y – deti 90-tych rokov alebo najmladšia generácia Z, narodená po roku 2000? Fanúšikovia obľúbenej šou sa znovu môžu tešiť na staronové prostredie Považského Inovca, v ktorom sa natáčala 13. séria Farmy, nekompromisnú Alicu, nový typ farmárčenia spojený s množstvo noviniek a výrazne zmenené pravidlá, ktoré prekvapia nejedného farmára. Opäť nebudú chýbať ani napínavé duely či jednotlivé epizódy, v ktorých sa bude striedať smiech, slzy, vtipné i dramatické situácie, a tak ako vždy budú plné nečakaných zvratov. Šou bude divákov aj tento rok sprevádzať obľúbený herec Marek Fašiang a chýbať nebude ani ostrieľaný hospodár Martin Bagar.

programme.title: Love Island III
programme.sub-title: Hľadanie lásky v raji v novej sérii obľúbenej romantickej šou
programme.desc: Slniečko, odhalené telá, morský vzduch a dovolenková atmosféra. Na obrazovky TV Markíza sa vracia Love Island, horúca reality šou plná zábavy, slnka, romantiky a hľadania lásky v známej vile na španielskom ostrove Gran Canaria. Šesť párov vzniknutých počas prvej a druhej série obľúbenej reality šou je spolu dodnes a vytvoriť zamilovaný pár sa pokúsia aj súčasní „singles“ zo Slovenska a Česka, obyvatelia vily tretej série. Budú si nielen užívať krásne počasie a zábavné hry, ale pod dohľadom televíznych kamier budú hľadať lásku svojho života. Diváčky a diváci v „priamom prenose“ uvidia, ako sa mladí ľudia nechávajú opantať láskou, so všetkými vzostupmi a pádmi, so všetkými emóciami, ktoré tento najkrajší cit so sebou prináša. Vzniknuté páry prejdú testom pevnosti svojich vzťahov, pretože každému, kto nebude v páre alebo bude spárovaný účelovo, bude hroziť, že bude musieť šou opustiť. Víťazná dvojica získa rozprávkových 75 000 eur. Zamilované „srdiečka“ prevedie pobytom na ostrove lásky opäť hviezdna moderátorka Zorka Hejdová.

programme.title: Adela show
programme.sub-title: Talkshow Adely Banášovej
programme.desc: Talkshow Adely Banášovej

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Najhoršie je, keď matka prežije svoje dieťa. Ešte horšie snáď je, keď vlastné dieťa matku oberie o byt a úspory. Eva, matka 5 dospelých detí, skončila ako bezdomovec v záhradnej chatke. Za niektorých platí z malej penzie stále pôžičky. Svokra robí čo môže, vybavuje na úradoch, stretáva sa s dcérou. Podarí sa otvoriť srdcia matke a dcére, aby opäť našli cestu k sebe? Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach. Pomóc, ide svokra!! Príde, obráti naruby domácnosť, vychová Vaše deti, vychová Vášho psa... Jazdí po Slovensku a má čo povedať do všetkých aspektov domácnosti! Navštevuje problémové rodiny, ktoré z rôznych dôvodov volajú o pomoc skúsenej ženy (neporiadok, finančné starosti, lenivý manžel, neporiadne deti...). Počas niekoľkých dní bude najprv sledovať a neskôr dohovárať a vysvetľovať obom manželom ako na vec. Svokra je dôkazom toho, že aj reality show môžu mať pozitívne, dlhodobé, život meniace následky. Reality šou poskytuje pohľad na transformáciu domácnosti, dáva divákovi možnosť nahliadnuť, ako žijú slovenské rodiny a ako zvládajú svoje deti, domácnosť, rozpočet, atď. Každá epizóda je plná bystrých a užitočných tipov ako viesť domácnosť, ktoré si divák môže vyskúšať.

programme.desc: Norwegian filmmaker Asgeir Helgestad follows a polar bear mother for four years as she struggles to raise her cubs as her home melts away under her feet.

programme.title: Mountains: Life Above the Clouds (2)
programme.desc: Himalaya. The highest mountain range is home to extraordinary animals and remarkable ancient cultures; snow leopards creep into isolated mountain villages; bizarre looking monkeys huddle for warmth; ancient Buddhist monasteries have rituals lost in time.

programme.title: Mountains: Life Above the Clouds (3)
programme.desc: Andes. The Andes is the longest mountain range in the world and home to astonishing hidden worlds, extraordinary animals and remarkable people. Featuring a puma hunt, bears searching for water in scorched forests and a newly discovered shapeshifting frog.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School (3)
programme.desc: King Kasper. Kasper, who is 90kgs, somehow eludes the capture team and climbs 30 meters high in a tree; Beni's food theft and ongoing weight gain starts causing serious concern for his health.

programme.title: Natural Born Rebels (2)
programme.desc: Hunger Wars. An unvarnished and fascinating insight into some lesser-known character traits exhibited by different species of animals when they are in need of food.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year (4)
programme.desc: Winter. Winter in Southern Africa brings drought, ice and storms; the animals that live here must compete with the weather, the land and each other; cheetahs, seals, vultures, and meerkats; rains finally end the dry season and trigger a burst of life.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife IX (2)
programme.desc: Kit's the Name. Hope fights to save a family of foxes; the nursery is hit by a mysterious outbreak.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue II (4)
programme.desc: Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelope's tracking collar and the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom, free two orphaned serval cats, and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild II (3)
programme.desc: The Mating Game. Madonna is the first Kinda baboon to be studied from birth to adulthood, and, now, she is looking for a mate.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife IX (2)
programme.desc: Kit's the Name. Hope fights to save a family of foxes; the nursery is hit by a mysterious outbreak.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild (2)
programme.desc: Chinga the Lion Cub. In South Africa's Greater Kruger Park, a lion cub finds her place in the wild under the guidance of a devoted father, a fierce mother and a playful sister.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas II (9)
programme.desc: Power. Sea lions throw their weight around to win a mate, Cape buffalo deliver knockout punches, Canada geese hit hard with their wings, and lionesses rule the Savanna with an iron paw.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas II (10)
programme.desc: Ugly. Warthogs' lumpy armor, giant African bullfrogs' jumping and biting skills, wild turkeys' sharp beaks and razorlike spurs, and Nile crocodiles' powerful jaws.

programme.title: Monkeys of Bioko
programme.desc: Off the coast of Africa lies an island home to incredible biodiversity and a jungle ruled by a unique primate; an alpha drill struggles to provide for his group while battling against large rivals, dark storms and a changing forest.

programme.desc: Windy City Hope. Hope fights a problem that kills millions of birds each year in Chicago.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike Flu. Poor Mike is bedridden. He's been struck down by a nasty cold so Iris and the turtles are forced take care of his every need, including trying to repel the raccoons from the house. Fighting raccoons isn't their specialty and Iris and the turtles quickly end up locked in the garage. Mike is forced to intervene but he's so sick and weak that he's a pushover. How can he overcome the raccoons this time? Mike's problem could be the very solution he needs to defeat the tenacious raccoons.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: In The Doghouse. Mike is forced to spend the day outside in his doghouse due to Grandma Mikkelsen's fur allergy. Mike makes the best of being exiled and plans to spruce the place up and invite Iris over for an outdoor picnic. But Mercury has been kicked out of his lair after a fight with his brother and decides to squat in the doghouse. Mike does everything he can to wake up the snoozing raccoon and get him out of his home. It looks like he's going to have to bring in the big guns if has any chance of evicting his unwanted guest before Iris shows up.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Car Wash. Mr Bean's car is filthy so he gives it a good wash. His sparklingly clean car attracts the attention of other drivers who offer to pay Mr Bean to wash their cars too. Bean cannot resist and builds a car-washing contraption to help him out. But when a certain very posh visitor’s car gets damaged Bean thinks he’s for the chop.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Where Did You Get That Cat? Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wicket’s flat but her sideboard tumbles over and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realizing that it’s only his landlady’s furry hat Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vets in a desperate attempt to save his feline friend’s life.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Valuable Lessons. Mr Bean helps Mrs Wicket collect up all her money together after she witnesses a robbery. With all her cash safely locked in a bank vault Mrs Wicket suddenly finds she has a new admirer but Mr Bean doesn’t trust this smooth operator one bit. With wedding bells ringing Mr Bean races against time to solve the mystery and save Mrs Wicket…and her money.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Halloween. Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they won’t forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Moley is a lively animated comedy series for children and families of all ages. It follows the underground adventures of a charmingly optimistic young mole, Moley. As the keeper of The Mystical Manual of Magic — known more affectionately as “Manny,” Moley is forever embarking on comedic, zany, Moletastic and thrilling magical adventures which are filled with heart, to help the citizens of the bustling city of MoleTown. What Moley lacks in physical prowess and smarts, he makes up for in heart and friendship! So, with his friends Dotty, a plucky, adventure-seeking mole, Mishmosh, an oddball inventor mole, Mona Lisa, the sensible grounded Mole and Mystic Mole, a wise old mole who knows more than he lets on - there’s no challenge Moley can’t mishandle-- but then soon overcome!

programme.sub-title: I Can Catch. Lu isn't as good at catching as she thought she was.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives though play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: Hip Replacement. The neighbor's cat turns out to be a hipster whose laidback attitudes and behaviors are soon adopted by Tom and the other alley cats. Annoyed, Jerry decides to put an end to all of their silly nonsense.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Moley is a lively animated comedy series for children and families of all ages. It follows the underground adventures of a charmingly optimistic young mole, Moley. As the keeper of The Mystical Manual of Magic — known more affectionately as “Manny,” Moley is forever embarking on comedic, zany, Moletastic and thrilling magical adventures which are filled with heart, to help the citizens of the bustling city of MoleTown. What Moley lacks in physical prowess and smarts, he makes up for in heart and friendship! So, with his friends Dotty, a plucky, adventure-seeking mole, Mishmosh, an oddball inventor mole, Mona Lisa, the sensible grounded Mole and Mystic Mole, a wise old mole who knows more than he lets on - there’s no challenge Moley can’t mishandle-- but then soon overcome!

programme.sub-title: Find The Blueberries. Lu and Biba accidentally rig their treasure hunt game.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives though play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Tic-Tyke-D'oh. Spike hasn't been the best role model for his boy when it comes to being a good sport. You could even say Spike's a sore loser. That's why Spike recruits Tom and Jerry to help teach the little guy how to lose gracefully. When Tom beats Tyke at a game of tic-tac-toe Tyke puts the "sore" into "sore loser" by biting Tom's finger when Tom extends it for a friendly post-game handshake. Tom forces Jerry to take turns playing various games with Tyke (e.g. Checkers, basketball, hopscotch, etc…). Each time they win, Tyke takes it out on them. When Tom and Jerry start throwing the games, Spike's right there to dole out his own punishment for letting Tyke win. Sometimes you just can't win!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Missing in Traction. When Tom's hit by a trolley while he and Jerry are investigating their latest case, he's sent to recover at the local animal hospital. But a detective is never off the case! Tom begins to suspect the answer to the case they're working on is right under his broken nose. Problem is, he's in traction and can't move. That's okay, he's got a partner in crime-solving – Doc Jerry makes the rounds at the animal hospital and solves the mystery, but not before sending Tom on the rounds to endure various tests (e.g. x-rays, stress test, physical therapy, etc…) and to do some investigating of his own.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Cat-titude Adjustment. After another destructive bout of cat and mouse, Hildie and Beatie decide that Tom's bad cat-titude has caused nothing but trouble around the cottage. What Tom needs is an attitude adjustment! With a flick of the wand, Tom becomes a doting cat. Much better! Jerry's loving the change at first, but he soon tires of the touchy-feely feline (even Newt is tiring of Tom's affections). Jerry tries every mouse trick in the book to trigger Tom's animal instincts, but nothing seems to break the spell. Jerry has to sneak Hildie's wand to reverse the spell, but it won't be easy with tag-along-Tom by his side every step of the way!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Funnel Face. When a little cat and mouse ends poorly for Tom, he ends up having to wear the cone of shame. Unable to remove it, deal with the emotional shame, or adapt to the giant plastic funnel on his head, Tom must find meaning in the suffering.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Wing Nuts. Little Quacker is heartsick and he's come to the cat and mouse detective to help mend his broken heart. You see, the duck fell in love at first quack with a bird he met luxuriating in the central park pond. The courtship went south (literally) when Quacker's honey coo-coo migrated with her flock. All that Quacker has left of her is a single feather and he's counting on the cat and mouse detective to find his one true love. Prince Charming had an easier time finding Cinderella with a glass slipper, but Tom and Jerry aren't about to fly the coop. In the end, they find the owner of the lost feather and reunite the two lovebirds who fly off into the sunset...

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Hair Today, Gone Tomorrow. Tom's being unusually difficult when he's rocked by an epiphany-- HE'S LOSING HIS HAIR! Paranoid that he's going to become a hairless cat, Tom will do anything Jerry tells him to do in order to regrow it. Think mud packs (more like mud slaps), hair transfers (one word – furballs) deep tissue massage to stimulate follicle development (a.k.a repeated blows to the head), and skunk therapy ('nuf said). Most everything he tries only leads to Ginger throwing him in the bath again. Ultimately, Tom realizes that Jerry's spiking his cat shampoo with hair remover and it's about to get hairy for the mouse!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.sub-title: Hunger Games. Tom is told he can't eat for 12 hours!
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Electric Turtles. The turtles are struck by lightning during a storm, turning them into positively charged projectiles zapping everything they touch and setting off all the appliances in the house. Mike gets locked outside by the raccoons who were freezing their little butts off in their lair. By the time Mike gets back inside all hell has broken loose, but Mike might have figured out how he can get rid of the raccoons and de-electrify the turtles at the same time.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Rescuing Roxanne. Playing with Louise and her doll gives Mike an idea. He decides to stage a rescue mission with the doll from the roof of the Mikkelson's house so he can be a hero and impress Iris. But as he prepares to show Iris that he's a real-life superhero, the racoons arrive and ruin his plans. Mercury falls in love with the doll the minute he lays eyes on it while Freddy sets his sights on her sparkly tiara. Now Mike has a real rescue on his hands, all under Iris's watchful gaze. The stakes couldn't be higher!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: A Sick Trick. The racoons watch Mike enviously as he makes himself comfortable in his living room. If only they could get a piece of that sweet action. Then Freddy has an idea. He crashes into the bay window and pretends to be injured, forcing the Mikkelsens to take him in. Mike sees through the ruse immediately, but if he's going to unmask the scheming raccoon he's going to have to defeat the imposter without getting himself in trouble for fighting the poor "injured" Freddy.

programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Bean Painting. Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. He’s so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares – with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Wrestle Bean. Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But he’s promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match – only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Rare Bird. Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and they’re willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.sub-title: Bean's Safari. Mr Bean finds himself babysitting a baboon.
programme.desc: Join the strange but hilariously funny Mr Bean and his stuffed teddy on adventures such as avoiding an irate landlady or an evil one-eyed cat.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Moley is a lively animated comedy series for children and families of all ages. It follows the underground adventures of a charmingly optimistic young mole, Moley. As the keeper of The Mystical Manual of Magic — known more affectionately as “Manny,” Moley is forever embarking on comedic, zany, Moletastic and thrilling magical adventures which are filled with heart, to help the citizens of the bustling city of MoleTown. What Moley lacks in physical prowess and smarts, he makes up for in heart and friendship! So, with his friends Dotty, a plucky, adventure-seeking mole, Mishmosh, an oddball inventor mole, Mona Lisa, the sensible grounded Mole and Mystic Mole, a wise old mole who knows more than he lets on - there’s no challenge Moley can’t mishandle-- but then soon overcome!

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch
programme.sub-title: Find The Blueberries. Lu and Biba accidentally rig their treasure hunt game.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives though play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The Old Gray Hair. After discovering a gray hair, Spikes decides he's too old to be the alpha of the house which sends Tom into full bully mode. Jerry will have to act fast to convince Spike he's still the alpha dog.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: (Not) Your Father's Mouse-Stache. It's the battle of the moustaches when Tom accidentally drinks a hair tonic potion left behind by Jerry – and Butch realizes he needs to acquire some facial hair of his own if he is to compete for Toodles and Dollface's attentions.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: Ball of Fame. When Tom and Jerry's antics unearth an autographed baseball – a childhood souvenir of Rick's – he warns Tom to keep his paws off it, or else! Tom attempts to obey, but Jerry's got other ideas and the ball gets out of hand. The guys chase the treasured ball all over the neighborhood, recovering it only to lose it again. And again. And again.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Pinch Hitter. When Tom ends up on the losing end of a little cat and mouse AGAIN Butch sends in Meathead, a pinch hitter, to deal with Jerry. Surprisingly, Meathead has no trouble catching the little mouse. There's nothing Tom or Jerry can do to make it harder. Jerry's superior intelligence is no match for Meathead's dumb luck.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Kitten Grifters. Tom and Jerry have made a connection between a variety of different cases involving the mysterious disappearance of household items -- all including a sighting of a supernaturally cute kitten. Tom and Jerry are on the case! Their investigation reveals a litter of hardened kitten con artists who are using the items they've taken to form a makeshift home. These kitty criminals are just looking for a home, but they don't want to be separated!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.sub-title: Fight in the Museum. Tom & Jerry spend a night in the museum.
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Cat-A-Tonic Mouse. When Jerry gets a cold he gets no help from Tom who chooses instead to use the mouse's down time to taunt the little guy and eat all of his favorite treats. Jerry resorts to help from Uncle Pecos who, after trying a few Texas remedies, mixes a home brewed Texas tonic to knock the cold p-p-p-plum out. As a side effect of the Tabasco fueled brew, the mouse is breathing fire within minutes. When Tom catches the same cold and gets a dose of the brew, it's an all-out flame war! Good thing Uncle Pecos is there to put the fire out!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Going Going Gone Viral. When Rick uploads a video of Tom getting his head stuck in Jerry's mouse hole, the video instantly goes viral and Tom becomes the laughing stock of the feline community. Now Tom must restore his reputation by catching Jerry and capturing it all on video. Easier said than done.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: School of Hard Knocks. Like a big brother, Jerry gets a sleepy Tuffy out of bed, makes them both breakfast, gets Tuffy cleaned up, puts on his backpack and scoots him past the mean ol' cat to the house next door where WINSTON waits, greeting his students, a gaggle of mice, including Jerry. They each hand their kindly teacher a treat as they take their seats on little spools of thread, ready for the start of class. Winston is teaching his students the basics of force and motion, and today they're going on a field trip to see physics in action. They end up at Tom's house where Tom bears the brunt of the school load until he gets a little tutoring himself.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Brain Food. Waffles is worried that his roommate Bo had his brain eaten by aliens, leaving him a zombie dog. Turns out he's not the first dog in his neighborhood to wake up stupid. Afraid of becoming the next Bo, Waffles hires the Cat and Mouse Detectives to put a stop to this alien invasion. Our Narrator thinks all of this extraterrestrial talk is a load of sci-fi hooey but not our detectives; they're covering all their bases and taking every necessary precaution. Turns out the dog's behavior has more to do with a tainted bag of kibble than visitors from another planet… or does it?

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives though play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch
programme.sub-title: A New Pet. Lu learns to be aware of and include others' need for choice
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives though play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch
programme.sub-title: Don't Want To Miss Out. Lu learns to commit to a decision
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives though play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Disappointment. The bugs talk about times they felt disappointed.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Seam Stress. Today, Queen has decided to commission a unique dress from her talented Seamstress Card: she wants it made out of wild thread – a very difficult one to tame! And should her Seamstress Card fail to pull it off, she will be relieved of her duties on the spot! Alice and Lewis jump to it, coming up with all kinds of bright ideas to help out the poor card. As a result, in the end, a whole cat walk of dresses awaits the Queen!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Freeze-All Cutie-Twee. Alice and Lewis find the twins frozen in place! It turns out to be the doing of a young Freeze-All Cutie-Twee who has become friends with Charlie. In fact, these two besties are having the time of their lives, traveling all over the place, freezing the whole Kingdom, unaware that the young Cutie-Twee has not yet mastered its powers! Alice and Lewis must find a way to persuade Charlie to take the Cutie-Twee back to its peers.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Not a Piece of Cake! When the Wonderland cuckoos realize their precious wild strawberry pies have all been picked, it’s mayhem! They go bonkers, screeching up a storm, almost deafening our poor friends. The Queen subsequently orders Alice and Lewis to put an end to this din! But the mission gets tricky when our two heroes find out who picked the pies!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Snow Queen. Alice and Lewis make a "snow-woman" in the Queen’s likeness. But, miffed at not bearing a very strong resemblance to the original, she heads off to meet her model. Our two heroes are scared: their mockery is about to be discovered! But surprise surprise!: the Queen is anything but offended! In fact, she takes the snow-woman under her wing, even going so far as to appoint her her deputy! Unfortunately for Alice and Lewis, this icy substitute becomes just as moody as the Queen: now they’re going to have to do all they can to remind her who she truly is!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: A New Friend. Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But it’s not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Bean’s home – eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: The Lift. Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they aren’t very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Dig This. Mr Bean attempts to build a shady gazebo in the back garden on a scorching hot day. But as he digs into the ground he unearths a huge unexploded bomb. Trying to make Mrs Wicket aware of the danger and save Scrapper and Teddy from being blown to smithereens takes courage nerve and a Bean styled homemade bomb disposal kit.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Bean Hypnotised. Mr Bean goes to the theatre to see a performance by a celebrated hypnotist Dr Daze. Bean is super keen to come up on stage and be part of the show. But after being hypnotized Bean unknowingly leaves the theatre not realizing that he is still under the influence and certain trigger sounds have him doing silly things at unexpected and embarrassing moments.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Moley is a lively animated comedy series for children and families of all ages. It follows the underground adventures of a charmingly optimistic young mole, Moley. As the keeper of The Mystical Manual of Magic — known more affectionately as “Manny,” Moley is forever embarking on comedic, zany, Moletastic and thrilling magical adventures which are filled with heart, to help the citizens of the bustling city of MoleTown. What Moley lacks in physical prowess and smarts, he makes up for in heart and friendship! So, with his friends Dotty, a plucky, adventure-seeking mole, Mishmosh, an oddball inventor mole, Mona Lisa, the sensible grounded Mole and Mystic Mole, a wise old mole who knows more than he lets on - there’s no challenge Moley can’t mishandle-- but then soon overcome!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Pizza Bean. Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he can’t refuse.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: The Photograph. Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourist’s snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Dancing Bean. Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort ‘win’ her over.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Bean Shopping. Mr Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. Bean takes advantage of the situation having fun in the various departments. But when he discovers a robbery taking place the fun and games stop as the desperate burglar chases Bean from floor to floor and all around the store.

However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe.
